|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-MT2500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = A (Brume 2) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/14/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/GL.iNet_GL-MT2500A_(Brume_2) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall, security appliance, router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-MT2500 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = MT2500-V0.2 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7981BA; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (''Filogic 820'') |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- 1.3 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD512M16C4; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = MaxLinear;GPY211;GPY211 (SLNW8); <!-- 2.5GbE PHY --> |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:83:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;5.18;OpenWrt 21.02;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = OpenVPN, WireGuard |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank--> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2022 |estprice = 79 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BQMJDDYR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Brume 2 (GL-MT2500/GL-MT2500A)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7981BA @1.3GHz (''Filogic 820'') :SoC: Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB (Type C) ports *Network: 1x 2.5GbE (WAN), 1x 1GbE (LAN) ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://store.gl-inet.com/products/brume-gl-mt2500 Official shop] *[https://docs.gl-inet.com/en/3/setup/gl-mt2500/first_time_setup/ Docs] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official forum]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/11/09/gl-inet-gl-mt2500a-security-gateway-review-unboxing-teardown/ ''GL.iNet GL-MT2500A Security Gateway Review'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/10/26/brume-2-openwrt-security-gateway-MediaTek-mt7981b-soc-wireguard-vpn/ ''Brume 2 - OpenWrt “Security Gateway” with MediaTek MT7981B SoC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==See also== {{GL.iNet models}}
